extension.name: WuBook Widget
extension.author: Eugenio Palumbo
extension.description: This plugin allows you to insert an online reception into your website

field.name: lcode
field.label: lcode
field.description: It is the structure's identification code. You can retrieve it the Extranet of WuBook.

field.name: p_avoiddates
field.label: avoiddates
field.description: If it's set to True, the choice of the date is not possible.

field.name: p_avoidcanc
field.label: avoidcanc
field.description: If it's set to True, the engine will not implement the cancellations.

field.name: p_avoidmail
field.label: avoidmail
field.description: If it's set to True, the online reception will not be implemented.

field.name: p_deflang
field.label: deflang
field.description: It sets the default language, if the wbloader cannot find the customer language the deflang value will be used.

field.name: p_theme
field.label: theme
field.description: You can customize the online reception theme.

field.name: p_css
field.label: css
field.description: You can customize the widget style.

field.name: p_horizonatal
field.label: horizonatal
field.description: If it's set to True, the widget will be populated horizontally.
